TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CorrelationDataMessageProperty extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty

summary.span: 提供訊息屬性，這個屬性會在套用通訊協定時累積額外的相互關聯資訊，例如當透過傳入訊息從 傳回資料時。

span.span: Provides a message property that accumulates additional correlation information for a message as protocols are applied, such as when data is returned from a over the incoming message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算將訊息與其他訊息建立關聯性的執行個體索引鍵時， 所累積的相互關聯資料會擴大訊息內容。The correlation data accumulated by the augments the message contents when calculating instance keys that relate messages to other messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訊息具有 ，則將相互關聯資料加入至 ，否則，則會加入包含相互關聯資料的 。If the message has a then the correlation data is added to the ; otherwise, a new is added that includes the correlation data.
